1586956972_1JcHMiQxXHX9q3ZK2LF9rZjvg3MUt.body: tbh, it could involve total media blackout because they would just outright classify the internet as a national security risk the second they fully internalize some idea that they lost control of it. however given we are now starting to see mesh network technology take off, i honestly think they'll eventually likely just completely sol, only relying on the generally complacent culture to try to cut off the oxygen to said networks and argue that the internet is somehow a dangerous thing when it is a staple in everyone's lives now. been seeing narratives of the internet being dangerous for a while now

1587407952_184rhnxM89SU1gDuPEaQPjynfytkR.body: for i2p file sharing, I'd just use XD bittorrent client and call it a day.
